thread.title: ‘Shahs of Sunset’ star ending her marriage after one month | Page Six
thread.title_full: ‘Shahs of Sunset’ star ending her marriage after one month | Page Six

author: Lindsey Kupfer
title: ‘Shahs of Sunset’ star ending her marriage after one month | Page Six
text:
Well, that was fast.
Golnesa “GG” Gharachedaghi and her new husband, Shalom, are calling it quits a little over a month after tying the knot, Page Six confirmed on Thursday.
“During the past few weeks, certain facts have come to GG’s attention that have made her realize her marriage can no longer continue, and, in fact, should never have happened,” her rep, Steve Honig, told us, adding, “She is hoping to end the relationship as amicably and respectfully as possible.”
The couple revealed last month that they secretly wed in January .
“January 25, 2017 We walked into a courthouse just to see what type of paperwork is needed for getting married. They sarcastically told us there’s a small chapel we could go to and do it right then,” she explained in an Instagram that has since been removed, “An hour later, we walked out of that chapel as husband & wife. We clearly weren’t dressed for it and I couldn’t stop laughing from shock … but f–k it … we’re not like ordinary people.”
Shalom popped the question in Times Square in December.
Last week, the reality star posted a photo of a girl holding up two middle fingers and the caption, “Truth is, a lot of people will attempt to break us in life… but it’s up to you to decide who’s worth the pain.”
E! News first reported the split .
